title: Sam Burgess dotes on children Poppy and Billy after 'split' from wife Phoebe
text:
NRL star Sam Burgess shared a smiling selfie doting on his two children on Saturday afternoon, amid reports he 'split 'from wife Phoebe several weeks ago.

'My two little everythings,' wrote Sam, 30, to Instagram alongside a series of pictures of himself with daughter Poppy, two, and ten-month-old son Billy.

Interestingly, it seems Sam travelled to Bowral in NSW's Southern Highlands to spend the day with his children, as this is where Phoebe and the youngsters have been staying in recent days.

'My two little everythings': Sam Burgess, 30, (pictured) doted on children Poppy, two, and Billy, ten months, on Saturday, after reportedly 'splitting' from wife Phoebe several weeks ago

On Sunday, it was claimed that Phoebe is moving to the well-to-do Southern Highlands permanently, leaving behind the pair's Maroubra mansion.

A source allegedly told The Daily Telegraph: 'It makes sense as Phoebe's support network is in Bowral. She grew up there, her mum and dad are there and her sister Jemima'.

The insider went on to say because the town is close to Sydney, Phoebe and Sam could continue to co-parent their two children.

Family: It appeared the trio enjoyed an outing in the Southern Highlands, where Phoebe (pictured) has spent the past week with their children at her parent's home in Bowral

Moving on? On Sunday, it was claimed that Phoebe, 30, is moving to the well-to-do Southern Highlands permanently, leaving behind the pair's Maroubra mansion

'It's only an hour away from Sydney so not too hard for Sam to still see the kids and Phoebe to be able to attend events for her clients,' the insider reportedly said.

Daily Mail Australia has reached out to Phoebe Burgess for comment.

On Thursday, Sam was photographed with a car boot full of bags, following reports he had 'moved out' of the couples $3.8 million home in Maroubra, Sydney.

He was not wearing his wedding ring while out on Thursday, with Phoebe also not wearing hers in an Instagram post shared last week.

Rumours: Phoebe was not wearing her wedding ring in this family picture shared to Instagram on Thursday, with Sam also not wearing his in the last week

Last weekend it was reported that Sam and Phoebe had broken up for a second time after initially splitting in December.

The pair had rekindled their marriage in April, but an insider claimed things 'just didn't work' and Sam 'moved out several weeks ago'.

During their brief separation earlier this year, Sam moved into Anthony Bell's $11.5 million Dover Heights mansion, The Sydney Morning Herald reported.

Neither Sam nor Phoebe has publicly commented on their rumoured split.
description: NRL star Sam Burgess shared a smiling selfie doting on his two children on Saturday afternoon, after reportedly 'splitting' from wife Phoebe several weeks ago.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
